section.section:
The Board shall place a licensee on inactive status if the licensee:
Submits to the Board an application for inactive status on the form required by the Board; and
Pays to the Board the inactive status fee set by the Board.

The Board shall reactivate the license of an individual placed on inactive status if the individual:
Satisfies the continuing education requirements established by the Board; and
Pays to the Board a reactivation fee set by the Board.
The Board may not reinstate the license of an individual who fails to apply for reinstatement of the license within 5 years after the expiration of the license.

An individual who fails to apply for reinstatement of a license within 5 years after the expiration of the license may become licensed by meeting the requirements for obtaining an initial license under this title.
